a.n: Taj Burrow: Life After The Tour

p.d: After almost two decades traveling the world, Taj Burrow was looking forward to the life away from the tour. Surfing the best waves he could find around West Oz, and spending time with his wife and daughter. That being said, the best surfer to never win a world title still enjoys the occasional getaway from Australia. This time the destination was the wave rich country of Portugal.
